content: round 13 single_crochet in every st around 27 single_crochet round 14 single_crochet in next 13 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 13 sts 28 single_crochet start stuffing the head rounds 15-18 single_crochet in every st around 28 single_crochet round 19 decrease single_crochet in next 11 sts decrease single_crochet in next 11 decrease 25 single_crochet round 20 *decrease single_crochet in next 3 sts * repeat from * to * around 20 single_crochet round 21 single_crochet in next 5 sts decrease 5 times single_crochet in next 5 sts 15 single_crochet round 22 *decrease single_crochet * repeat from *to * around 10 single_crochet finish stuffing round 23 decrease around 5 single_crochet fasten_off with long tail and sew end closed ears make 2 - using aran yarn and 3 5mm hook round 1 chain 2 3 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 3 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 4 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet now would be a good time to hide your beginning tail round 4 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts 6 single_crochet round 5 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts * repeat from * to * 8 single_crochet rounds 6-8 single_crochet in every st around 8 single_crochet round 9 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3sts * repeat from * to * 10 single_crochet round 10 single_crochet in every st around 10 single_crochet fasten_off with long tail and pinch sides in half lengthwise at the bottom as shown in photo on the next page and sew end shut and sew to head sew on the 9th-10th round on the head apply blush to cheeks if using blush arms- make 2 - using aran yarn and 3 5mm hook round 1 chain 2 5 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 5 single_crochet rounds 2-3 single_crochet in every st around 5 single_crochet hide beginning end pinch sides together and sew hole closed do not stuff fasten_off with long tail and sew between rounds 9-10 of body back foot make 2 using aran yarn and 3 5mm hook round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 2 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat from * to * 8 single_crochet hide the beginning end round 3 single_crochet in every st around 8 single_crochet round 4 *decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts * repeat from * to * 6 single_crochet fasten_off with long tail lightly stuff foot and sew hole closed sew to round 18 of the body you will want to sew the feet with about 4-5 sts apart from each other we are making a tripod out of the feet and tail to help the bunny sit up tail- using white yarn and 3 5mm hook round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet
